item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: bluchic
item.content:encoded: [left][/left] [right]The following contact form is generated from the selection of our built-in Custom Shortcode, please check the documentation on how to setup the Contact Form using Shortcode. Other options is to use a contact form plugin for advance setup with more variant of form field. [contact email="hello@bluchic.com" subject="Inquiry" message="Thank you for reaching us! We'll reply as soon as possible."][/right]

item.title: Shortcode
item.dc:creator: bluchic
item.content:encoded:
3 Columns
[col1]Column 1: Dessert pastry bear claw bear claw tart sesame snaps cheesecake wafer. Caramels pastry pastry toffee. Dessert macaroon brownie bear claw liquorice cake topping sweet roll. Tiramisu chocolate bar bonbon caramels powder cheesecake drage. Lemon drops jujubes souffl biscuit. {More} [/col1] [col2]Column 2:Bonbon sweet marshmallow. Chupa chups macaroon pudding pastry croissant. Gingerbread sugar plum danish toffee pie tootsie roll chocolate cake. Tiramisu gummi bears oat cake candy. Sesame snaps fruitcake tootsie roll. Macaroon cotton candy jelly beans chocolate cake pastry jujubes. [/col2] [col3]Column 3: Danish cupcake cake. Brownie candy canes candy canes powder chocolate cake pudding carrot cake sweet cheesecake. Cheesecake sesame snaps lollipop ice cream pastry chupa chups. Bear claw danish icing pie croissant tart. Donut fruitcake croissant sweet roll.[/col3] [line]
2 Columns
[left]Left: Souffl chocolate bar caramels sesame snaps marshmallow. Cookie applicake tart. Gingerbread bear claw pudding carrot cake muffin dessert muffin sugar plum tiramisu. Dessert donut souffl jelly icing chupa chups lollipop cheesecake. Danish cupcake cake. Brownie candy canes candy canes powder chocolate cake pudding carrot cake sweet cheesecake.[/left] [right]Right: Pie jujubes chocolate cake toffee liquorice fruitcake fruitcake tiramisu. Jelly marshmallow oat cake cookie drage icing. Toffee lollipop brownie pastry topping. Toffee apple pie biscuit. Bonbon gingerbread applicake tootsie roll faworki tart. Oat cake dessert powder liquorice tootsie roll pie ice cream chocolate cake. Souffl pastry halvah.[/right] [warning]Warning Box. Lollipop pie tiramisu oat cake sweet roll. Cupcake chupa chups candy canes applicake pudding cupcake muffin croissant. Topping chocolate oat cake gummies ice cream topping powder.[/warning] [disclaim]Info / Disclaimer Box. Sweet macaroon danish jelly candy liquorice icing halvah. Sugar plum marzipan tart cookie. Croissant danish sweet roll bonbon jujubes marshmallow wafer cupcake powder.[/disclaim] [question]Question Box. Apple pie donut drage danish topping chupa chups. Candy pudding bear claw icing fruitcake. Bear claw chocolate bar jelly beans macaroon cotton candy marzipan sesame snaps lemon drops.[/question] [left] You can create a simple contact form: [contact email="hello@bluchic.com" subject="Contact form: Geraldine Theme" message="Thank you for sending message!"] [/left] [right] [tooltip text="Hey ho, this is how tool-tip functions"]Mouse hover to this text to see tool-tip effect[/tooltip] [accordion title="Accordion: Click here to expand the text"]Jelly liquorice caramels lemon drops lollipop candy canes chocolate bar cupcake sweet roll. Pastry tart gingerbread caramels. Jelly beans cupcake macaroon candy canes. Marzipan marzipan dessert lemon drops muffin pie.[/accordion]

item.title: Insert slider in the sample post
item.dc:creator: bluchic
item.content:encoded: Sometimes you may need to upload a lot of pictures on a blog post. It might result in a long loading page and readers might need to scroll along the way. Nothing's wrong with that, but if you'd love to keep your blog post short and sweet, yet still able to show lots of image, this can be a solution for you. [slide id="Slider_id"] [images src="http://demo.bluchic.com/themes/jacqueline/files/2013/11/img.jpg" title="image title" caption="Feel free to enter an image caption here" url="http://www.bluchic.com/shop"] [images src="http://demo.bluchic.com/themes/jacqueline/files/2013/11/img.jpg" title="image title" caption="Life is a beautiful ride" url="http://www.bluchic.com/"] [/slide] Introducing a new addition to our shortcode, which allows you to add slider images easily into blog post or pages.You can insert caption and link the slider image to other url. With the arrow, readers can navigate to the next or previous image. Kindly check this documentation on how to setup slider shortcode.

item.title: Gallery
item.dc:creator: bluchic
item.content:encoded: Click on the thumbnail to enlarge the image. Please note that this simple gallery is built based on the awesome gallery functionality from WordPress - here's the documentation on how to setup this gallery page. If youd like to have the thumbnail functioning as an album instead of lightbox, we suggest to use Plugin for more advance functionality. [gallery link="file" columns="4" ids="129,128,169,170"]

  • Drage chocolate bar candy chupa chups biscuit. Macaroon bonbon drage pudding cheesecake ice cream apple pie souffl sugar plum. Wafer dessert muffin lollipop.
  • Candy canes chocolate cake fruitcake sweet apple pie gummies croissant. Brownie unerdwear.com bear claw. Toffee cake unerdwear.com toffee macaroon apple pie.
  • Cake unerdwear.com croissant chocolate cake. Pie candy powder marshmallow cookie cupcake apple pie. Tiramisu jelly fruitcake candy canes topping pie. Danish pudding unerdwear.com chocolate cake unerdwear.com gummi bears pastry candy canes gummi bears.
  • Jelly-o macaroon carrot cake fruitcake gummies tootsie roll. Bear claw caramels pastry. Macaroon brownie topping biscuit pastry sweet roll macaroon pudding wafer.
  • Gingerbread applicake icing cake bear claw powder muffin. Brownie bonbon jelly. Marshmallow powder toffee cheesecake icing pudding. Dessert wafer bear claw lollipop gingerbread.
  • Sugar plum croissant cotton candy jelly-o candy canes muffin souffl. Candy canes danish tiramisu apple pie croissant dessert danish tiramisu souffl. Pie apple pie chocolate bar icing jujubes bear claw liquorice muffin.
[/col3_2] [col3_1] [/col3_1] Mauris sed volutpat lectus. Suspendisse nisl ligula, scelerisque ac rhoncus in, elementum vitae augue. Nunc posuere adipiscing mi, vel varius dui varius ac. Curabitur risus ligula, semper et sapien eu, ornare ornare enim. [/pullquote] Cheesecake icing chocolate pudding oat cake chocolate chupa chups sesame snaps. item.title: Sample post with pull quote
item.dc:creator: bluchic
item.content:encoded: This demo site is showing blog with excerpt post and thumbnail. You can choose to show full post as well. If you don't want to have sidebar, there is an option to show as full width blog. Setting available in Theme Options. Powder muffin candy chocolate wypas cheesecake cotton candy sesame snaps. Chocolate bar candy canes pie jelly liquorice gummi bears halvah carrot cake. Faworki jelly-o jujubes marzipan sweet roll candy sugar plum. Jelly cookie pastry marshmallow pastry jelly beans faworki jujubes. Ice cream oat cake sugar plum souffl croissant caramels apple pie sugar plum, link here. [pullquote width="300" float="left"]Sweet wypas tootsie roll chocolate biscuit. Toffee pastry chupa chups candy. Dessert cookie sugar plum pudding cotton candy liquorice jujubes donut.[/pullquote] Bonbon macaroon jelly-o sugar plum tiramisu sweet roll bonbon biscuit. Gingerbread topping applicake dessert marshmallow. Chocolate bar cake donut gummi bears cookie. Chupa chups sesame snaps sugar plum muffin sesame snaps cupcake liquorice macaroon pastry. Macaroon cake jujubes marshmallow chupa chups donut. Ice cream gingerbread powder fruitcake sweet tart sesame snaps brownie. Halvah caramels tiramisu brownie sugar plum jelly-o lollipop toffee apple pie. Biscuit jujubes cookie icing oat cake ice cream chocolate liquorice chocolate. Liquorice carrot cake marshmallow sesame snaps marshmallow toffee jelly-o cupcake souffl. Toffee sesame snaps sugar plum sesame snaps. Apple pie bonbon pudding donut drage sweet powder lollipop biscuit. Toffee wypas biscuit gummies gingerbread danish liquorice.

item.title: Title of featured slider goes here
item.dc:creator: bluchic
item.content:encoded: Sometimes you may need to upload a lot of pictures on a blog post. It might result in a long loading page and readers might need to scroll along the way.

item.title: Featured slider #2
item.dc:creator: bluchic
item.content:encoded: Donut sweet roll croissant. Tiramisu chocolate cake drage cotton candy. Chocolate bar pudding jelly. Danish macaroon brownie cake croissant.
